title: Legolas, Dauntless Hunter (4R73)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Companion • Elf
Strength:	6
Vitality:	3
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Aragorn
Game Text:	Archer. The twilight cost of each Shadow event and Shadow condition is +1 for each unbound Hobbit you can spot.
Lore:	”'They are far, far away…. I know in my heart that they have not rested this night.'”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Lists: EXL
